alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 03 at 2:39PM PDT until November 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches in the valleys and 6 to 10 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Sherman Pass, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Inchelium, Wauconda, Boulder Creek Road, Republic, and Chesaw Road. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Winter travel conditions expected over Sherman Pass. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
